title: X-scap8: Integrated Indoor Funground on Orchard Road
blurb: Fun activities to challenge, de-stress and chillax!
description: X-scap8 is the largest integrated indoor Funground on Orchard Road, offering a diverse range of fun activities. Experience the Infinity & Beyond high element course, X-Warrior Challenge obstacle course, Smash Lab for de-stressing, and nostalgic Arcade Games! Enjoy food and drinks at our RestoBar with views of the Singapore skyline and Orchard Road. It's a great place for families and kids to have fun and enjoy various activities together. The venue caters to a wide range of ages and interests, making it a perfect destination for a family outing. With activities ranging from physical challenges to arcade games, there's something for everyone to enjoy.

description: X-scap8 is the largest integrated indoor Funground on Orchard Road, offering a diverse range of fun activities. Experience the Infinity & Beyond high element course, X-Warrior Challenge obstacle course, Smash Lab for de-stressing, and nostalgic Arcade Games!
